name: new
description: 1. The Home page has the functionalites of Navbar on top body and footer subsequently 2. In the body we have cards that show the name, Cuisines, Rating of a Particular restaurant. 3. These are fetched by the public API of swiggy. 4. There is a search box on top of Cards where a user can search for a Particular restaurant.  5. The functionality of Search box has been implemented using Hooks - UseEffect and UseState 6. we also added shimmer effect to show a loading gif during the time of fetching the API. 7. we added 404 Page to show when a Search result is not found  8. We are constantly Updating the UI and functionalites.
